actors.description: William Bradley 'Brad' Pitt is an American actor and film producer. He has received a Golden Globe Award, a Screen Actors Guild Award, and three Academy Award nominations in acting categories
actors.name: Brad Pitt

actors.children: Suri Cruise, Isabella Jane Cruise, Connor Cruise
actors.description: Tom Cruise, is an American film actor and producer. He has been nominated for three Academy Awards and has won three Golden Globe Awards. He started his career at age 19 in the 1981 film Endless Love.
actors.name: Tom Cruise

actors.children: Lily-Rose Melody Depp, John 'Jack' Christopher Depp III
actors.description: John Christopher 'Johnny' Depp II is an American actor, film producer, and musician. He has won the Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors Guild award for Best Actor.
actors.name: Johnny Depp

actors.children: Shiloh Nouvel Jolie-Pitt, Maddox Chivan Jolie-Pitt
actors.description: Angelina Jolie is an American actress, film director, screenwriter, and author. She has received an Academy Award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, and three Golden Globe Awards.
actors.name: Angelina Jolie

actors.children: Colin Hanks, Chet Hanks, Elizabeth Ann Hanks, Truman Theodore Hanks
actors.description: Thomas Jeffrey 'Tom' Hanks is an American actor, producer, writer, and director. Hanks is best known for his roles in Big, A League of Their Own, Sleepless in Seattle, Forrest Gump, Apollo 13.
actors.name: Tom Hanks

actors.children: Jaden Smith, Willow Smith, Trey Smith
actors.description: Willard Carroll 'Will' Smith, Jr. is an American actor, producer, and rapper. He has enjoyed success in television, film, and music.
actors.name: Will Smith
